title: Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm: Purple Passion Flower
body: Purple Passion Flower         Photo courtesy of the Deleware Wildflowers Organization.  Passiflora incarnata In 2003, a list compiled by the Maryland Department of Natural Resources placed the Purple Passion Flower on a list of rare, threatened and endangered plants. These plants can be spotted along Oxon Cove.
